se.itu.game.cave

Class RoomRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.itu.game.cave.RoomRule

  • public abstract class RoomRule
extends Object

    Represents a RoomRule for the game.

    Could be a rule for some kind of creature in a room, with magic properties.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RoomRule(Room room, String creatureDescription)
      Creates a new RoomRule.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void apply()
      Applies this RoomRule - will possibly effect the creatureDescription, make stuff magically appear, or even Doors to new Rooms appear.
      void changeCreatureDescription(String newDescription)
      Changes the creatureDescription.
      String creatureDescription()
      Returns the creatureDescription about this Rule, e.g.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • RoomRule

        public RoomRule(Room room,
                String creatureDescription)
        Creates a new RoomRule.
        Parameters:
        room - The Room this rule applies to
        creatureDescription - The description of this rule, e.g. "A Snake blocks the South exit"

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        public abstract void apply()
        Applies this RoomRule - will possibly effect the creatureDescription, make stuff magically appear, or even Doors to new Rooms appear.

      • changeCreatureDescription

        public void changeCreatureDescription(String newDescription)

        Changes the creatureDescription. Could be used when the rule has taken effect.

        Parameters:
        newDescription - The new description of the creature.

      • creatureDescription

        public String creatureDescription()

        Returns the creatureDescription about this Rule, e.g. "A Snake blocks...".

        This method will automatically apply the rule before returning the description.

        Returns:
        The creatureDescription of this RoomRule, e.g. "A Dragon stands in the Room"
